ch0194_00_akagi/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I can feel your powerful spirit again today.
ch0194_00_akagi/0101_0701_02_10:
Your spirit is something I lack—something I can’t
even comprehend... But perhaps in your case, it
can be considered an asset.
ch0194_00_akagi/0601_0701_01_10:
We humans and Pokémon are incomplete. Because
we are all so lacking, we fight, we maim...
ch0194_00_akagi/0601_0701_02_10:
I hate the incompleteness. That we are all
incomplete, I hate it with my entire body
and being.
ch0194_00_akagi/0601_0701_03_10:
The world should be complete. The world
must change.
ch0194_00_akagi/0605_0701_01_10:
Tell me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
What does friendship mean to you?
ch0194_00_akagi/0605_0701_02_10:
Friendship is a vague, incomplete concept. We are
better off abandoning such useless sentimentality.
ch0194_00_akagi/1701_0701_01_10:
Ah, it’s you. Excellent timing. This is for you.
Use it well.
ch0194_00_akagi/1701_0702_01_10: I no longer have any need for it.
ch0194_00_akagi/1701_0702_02_10: This will save me the trouble of disposing of it.
ch0194_00_akagi/2501_0701_01_10:
We humans and Pokémon are incapable of
understanding each other.
ch0194_00_akagi/2501_0701_02_10:
If we did, all these ugly conflicts would
never happen.
ch0194_00_akagi/2501_0701_03_10:
It is because of emotions that, even in a place like
Pasio, an organization like Team Break exists.
ch0194_00_akagi/2501_0701_04_10:
An ugly group like that could not be further
from perfection.
ch0194_00_akagi/2501_0702_01_10:
I do not concern myself with those who act based
on flawed, incomplete things like emotions.
ch0194_00_akagi/2501_0702_02_10:
However, if you are embroiled in conflict with a
group like Team Break, I will at least listen to
what you have to say.
ch0194_00_akagi/3001_0701_01_10:
Vague and incomplete things like emotions and
spirit waver and vanish, much like how fog fades
in the morning sun.
ch0194_00_akagi/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio... To think that people could have built such
an enormous island.
ch0194_00_akagi/3006_0701_01_10:
*sigh* The silence of night is the closest thing there
is to my perfect world.
